backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with product, retailer, listing, application, and order-related types plus migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Defines legacy data types and migration structures for converting old state to new formats.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers and renders the router and toaster within an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Implements a searchable dropdown using popover and command components.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Wrapper showing a destructive alert indicating admin backend functions are not implemented.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Displays a fullâ€‘screen loading overlay during identity login or actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity auth and handles login errors while updating React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Simple dialog placeholder indicating upcoming profile setup functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that checks admin status and blocks access with an error card if the user is not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppr: Gatekeeper component that requires account approval, allowing admins through and offering an approval request flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Protects routes by requiring an authenticated identity and showing a login prompt if missing.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Image component with graceful fallback placeholders when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: Top-level error boundary that captures runtime and unhandled promise errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: UI screen displaying unexpected runtime errors with options to reload or return home.
frontend/src/components/shop/cart/CartPr: Context provider managing cart state with add, remove, quantity updates, totals, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Hook providing search, filter, and sort controls for a product catalogue with derived category lists.
frontend/src/components/shop/CataloguePr: Empty placeholder file for a catalogue preview section.
Footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with year and host tracking.
Responsive shop header with navigation, cart display, login button, and admin link handling.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopLanding: Empty placeholder file for the shop landing hero section.
Layout wrapper composing header, footer, and auth initialization overlay around shop pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Empty hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Defines catalog query keys and a placeholder hook returning an empty global catalogue until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: Defines listing query keys and placeholder CRUD hooks that currently return empty data or throw until backend methods are implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useNomaYini.ts: Empty hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines order query keys and placeholder order-related queries and mutations that return empty data or throw until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides product query keys and placeholder CRUD hooks using the actor but with unimplemented backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements approval-related queries and mutations using the actor, with support for checking and setting approval and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailers.ts: Defines retailer query keys and placeholder CRUD hooks returning empty data or throwing until backend methods are added.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleApplications.t: Empty hook file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTowns.ts: Defines town query keys and placeholder hooks for listing, creating, and deleting towns with unimplemented backend logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles; all backend calls are placeholders returning null or empty data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and shared utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDriversPag: Empty admin page placeholder for driver management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageList: Empty admin page placeholder for listings management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPickupPoin: Empty admin page placeholder for pickup point management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: Empty admin page placeholder for retailer management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminShoppersPa: Empty admin page placeholder for shopper management.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Admin dashboard showing user approval stats and allowing approving or rejecting pending users.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CataloguePage.ts: Shows product catalogue with search and category filters; relies on backend data and includes loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout flow handling delivery, payment, order submission, and success UI; order creation uses a backend hook.
frontend/src/pages/shop/DriverDashboardP: Empty page placeholder for driver dashboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: UI page describing upcoming role applications with cards for driver, shopper, and pickup point roles, plus a link to application status.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MasterAdminRoleA: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays user orders with loading, error, empty states, and navigation to catalogue; actual order data pending backend.
Shows order details or loading/error states, with placeholder content until backend is implemented.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Home page with hero section, feature cards, and optional join button, introducing the platform.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RequestNewProduc: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerCatalogP: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerListPage: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: UI page showing placeholder application tracking state with option to navigate to join page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ShopperDashboard: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/router/HashRouter.tsx: Custom hash-based router mapping paths to pages with auth/admin guards and navigation helper.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utilities for formatting, parsing, and validating South African Rand values.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Helpers for selecting primary and additional product images, generating URLs, and checking image limits.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds deployment-safe URLs for public assets using Vite's base URL.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: Exports a constant list and type for South African provinces.
frontend/src/utils/themeAssets.ts: Defines theme asset URLs for logo and hero images using publicAssetUrl.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts IC timestamp values to readable date and datetime strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes overall project state, features, architecture notes, image requirements, and known issues for the ordering app.
